article.title: Providence U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Providence U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
Providence Office Contact Information

Providence U.S. Export Assistance Center
315 Iron Horse Way, Suite 101
Providence, RI 02908
Fax: 512-916-5940 Phone: 401-528-5104
Fax: 401-528-5067
Email: keith.yatsuhashi@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/rhodeisland​

Providence Staff

Keith Yatsuhashi, USEAC Director

Phone: 401-528-5104
Fax: 401-528-5067
Email: Keith.Yatsuhashi@trade.gov

Trade Information Center​

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30 am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the Providence U.S. Export Assistance Center.
